 2010-03472010-03-19,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of KPMG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as auditor of the Canada Development Investment Corporation for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2009; and appointment of the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditor of the Canada Development Investment Corporation for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2009.
